description: Raising the ridge of the main roofslope; rear roof extension; installation of two rooflights to front roof slope.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: A-100 Rev 00 Location and Site Plan; A-201 Rev 01 Existing Grd / 1st Level Plan Sheet 01; A-202 Rev 01 Existing Roof / Loft Level Plan Sheet 02; A-251 Rev 01 Existing Side Elevation Sheet 01; A-252 Rev 01 Existing Side Elevation Sheet 02; A-253 Rev 01 Existing Front / Rear Elevation Sheet 03; A-301 Rev 02 Proposed Grd / 1st Level Plan Sheet 01; A-302 Rev 02 Proposed Roof / 2nd Level Plan Sheet 02; A-351 Rev 02 Proposed Side Elevation Sheet 01; A-352 Rev 02 Proposed Side Elevation Sheet 02; A-353 Rev 02 Proposed Front / Rear Elevation Sheet 03; A-401 Rev 02 Proposed Long Section Sheet 01; A-402 Rev 00 Proposed Long Section Sheet 01; A-901 Rev 02 Proposed Isometric Sheet 01; A-902 Rev 02 Proposed Isometric Section Sheet 02.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Plan Document (2013). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall be not project more than 150mm from the roof plane (of the main roof slope) and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and Policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
